title: Never to Know
description: Helen always assumed that her childhood, with an extremely conceited and selfish mother, would have equipped her for any situation that adult life could bring. She was wrong! Nothing could have prepared her for the psychopath that entered her world.He caused turmoil and mayhem and Helen soon realised that he had only one purpose in life which he would achieve by any means.This is a page turning book of love and betrayal. A psychopath out for revenge who will stop at nothing. Even murder.
author: Patricia Fincken
